name: The Tree of Knowledge
description:
OF THIS TREE YOU SHALL NOT EAT!

In this game, you control the supernatural powers of the famous tree of knowledge of good and evil. Try to keep the people away from the forbidden fruit as long as possible by blowing them away from the tree and pulling them down into the ground with your tree's roots.

This game was developed for Book Jam by GameDevNetwork. #bookjam 

Controls

A - Blow left
D - Blow right
Left Arrow - Ground attack left
Right Arrow - Ground attack right
